Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your growth. Given its high value to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a strategic investment opportunity that aligns well with your company's goals and budget. We are confident that this product will deliver substantial returns on your investment. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
